txt.en:
'These avanc, as you call them, are in fact mortal creatures, not demons? If this is so, then I wonder what value their hides might have.

'What other creature that you have seen has both fur and scale bearing hides? If these are, in fact, a breed of dragon-kind, then their scales might make strong armour, with fur for warmth in cold weather.

'Would you gather some of these hides for me, so that I might examine them more closely?'
'These are indeed wondrously strange hides! I could trade for many marvelous things for my people...I thank you for bringing these to me.'
'Have you gathered the avanc-hides I asked for?'
Intrigued by the mortal qualities of the avanc, Amal has gained a curiosity as to the value of avanc-hides.
Avanc can be found throughout the Rushgore.\n\nAmal has asked you to hunt avanc for their hides.
Bring the avanc-hides to Amal at the Woodman camp in the Rushgore
Amal is at the Woodman camp at the heart of the Rushgore.\n\nYou should bring the avanc-hides you collected to Amal.
